Actions.Name: Double Team
Actions.Effect: The rider and an ally in range 3 can each dash 1, then deal 2 damage to an adjacent foe.

Actions.Name: Taunt
Actions.Description: A foe in range 3 must save or be shoved towards the rider as far as possible, then gain hatred of the rider. On a successful save, they are shoved 1 towards the rider.

Actions.Name: Lancer's Splendor
Actions.Description: The rider takes a magnificent pose and gains aura 2. The rider and allies in the aura are sturdy and deal bonus damage with all abilities.
